name: Anna Montero | Games Development - 3D Game Assessment
name_original: Anna Montero | Games Development - 3D Game Assessment
description: Croissant Run is a 3D Game developed by Anna Montero using Unity. Play as a hungry soldier and explore the small medieval village to find 20 croissants scattered around town within the given time limit. However, the game doesn’t end there! Once all 20 croissants have been collected there’s an extra task awaiting the player!
